mapper.select: select scooter.id, scooter.qc_id qcId, scooter.scooter_bom_id bomId, c.color_name colorName, c.color_value colorValue, g.group_name groupName, scooter.qty, scooter.qualified_qty qualifiedQty, scooter.unqualified_qty unqualifiedQty, scooter.qty - (scooter.unqualified_qty + scooter.qualified_qty) pendingQcQty, true idClass from ope_qc_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group g on scooter.group_id = g.id and g.dr = 0 left join ope_color c on scooter.color_id = c.id and c.dr = 0 where scooter.dr = 0 and scooter.qc_id = #{qcId}

select scooter.id, scooter.qc_id, scooter.scooter_bom_id, c.color_name,c.color_value, g.group_name, scooter.qty, scooter.qualified_qty,scooter.unqualified_qty,serial.id sn_id,serial.serial_num, serial.bluetooth_mac_address, serial.lot, serial.created_time, '奥格工厂' factory_name,concat(g.group_name,'-',c.color_name) `name`,true id_class from ope_qc_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group g on scooter.group_id = g.id and g.dr = 0 left join ope_color c on scooter.color_id = c.id and c.dr = 0 left join ope_qc_order_serial_bind serial on scooter.id = serial.order_b_id and serial.dr = 0 where scooter.dr = 0 and scooter.id = #{id}
